== Ghattikai (603594) ==
      
Ghattikai is a village in the [[Siddapur ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 178.48 hectares and harbouring 46 households with total population of 173 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[SIRSI]] is at a distance of 17 km. Male population is 84 and female population is 89. Scheduled Caste Population is 0 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 603594<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
